reference.title: Firebird/Interbase Functions (PDO_FIREBIRD)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Connecting to Firebird and Interbase databases

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
The PDO_FIREBIRD Data Source Name (DSN) is composed of the following elements:
DSN prefix
The DSN prefix is firebird:.
dbname
The name of the database.
charset
The character set.
role
The SQL role name.

&reftitle.examples;
PDO_FIREBIRD DSN examples
The following example shows a PDO_FIREBIRD DSN for connecting to Firebird and Interbase databases:
firebird:dbname=DATABASE.GDE
